DOC.brief_summary: The safety efficacy Esflurbiprofen Hydrogel Patch assess compare placebo treatment acute pain due ankle sprain
DOC.brief_title: Proof-of-concept Study NSAID Hydrogel Patch Treatment Acute Pain
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject must male female age 18 65 year , inclusive . 2 . Subject must diagnosis uncomplicated acute minor ankle sprain Grade I II define AAOS criterion . 3 . Ankle sprain must occur < 48 hour prior Screening . 4 . Subject must baseline selfevaluated pain score > 50 mm 100 mm VAS bearing weight affect ankle . 5 . Female subject childbearing potential must negative serum pregnancy test Screening willing use acceptable form birth control day first dose administration 30 day last administration study product . 6 . Subject must willing refrain use pain medication ( allow rescue medication ) participation . 1 . Subject pregnant , breastfeeding , lactate female . 2 . Subject acute ankle sprain Grade III define AAOS criterion . 3 . Subject ankle fracture confirm Xray . 4 . Ankle sprain require surgical treatment . 5 . Subject experienced recurrent sprain ( â‰¥3 sprain joint ) sprain affected joint within last 12 month . 6 . Subject take analgesic NSAID ( ) acetaminophen purpose within 7 day Screening . 7 . Subject take flurbiprofen naproxen within 24 hour Screening . 8 . Ankle sprain treat prior Screening ultrasound , physical therapy , acupuncture . 9 . Subject use immunomodulators immunosuppressive therapy ( e.g. , interferon , oral parenteral corticosteroid , cytotoxic drug ) within 4 week prior randomization . 10 . Subject use medicated topical agent ( e.g. , medicate cream lotion ) affect ankle within 7 day prior Screening . 11 . Subject currently use medication , opinion Investigator , may exacerbate mask anticipated side effect NSAIDs interfere Investigator 's ability monitor ( e.g. , blood thinner protonpump inhibitor ) . 12 .
